body.description: Small spaces require appropriately sized solutions, which is why our line of On The Go vehicle air fresheners work hard to eliminate odors without overwhelming small spaces. Quickly eliminate odors from your car, truck, RV, and more, with Citrus Magic On The Go Solid Odor Absorbers. Our unique formula contains baking soda and vegetable-based odor eliminators to absorb odors around the clock for up to 8 weeks, freshening the air in your vehicle. Eliminate smoke, pet odors, and food odors. Continuous, convenient odor control, 24/7. Simply place the solid odor absorber under the seat in your car, or in your trunk or cargo area, and absorb foul odors. Enjoy the drive!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Citrus Magic Citrus Magic has worked to produce safe, naturally based products, free from harsh chemicals, that effectively work at eliminating odors, freshening the air and maintaining a clean environment at home, at work, or even during travel. Furthermore, our products are made to be Prop 65, VOC, and CARB compliant. Citrus Magic strives to maintain the highest level of natural possible while still creating effective, and great smelling, products for your home. Experience the Magic! Small spaces require appropriately sized solutions, which is why our line of On The Go vehicle air fresheners work hard to eliminate odors without overwhelming small spaces. The most effective odor eliminators come from nature and Citrus Magic harnesses that natural power. For us, non-aerosol is the way to be, so that crisp, clean scent is all you inhale. A refreshing mix of clean cotton, vibrant citrus and fragrant florals Use in a variety of places: glove boxes, trunks, under seats, on floorboards, trailers, workshops, sheds, and areas of your home where odors are a problem Remove odors associated with smoke, pet, dampness, and food, in your home or automobile for up to 8 weeks

Easy-To-Use Simply place the solid odor absorber under the seat in your car, or in your trunk or cargo area, and absorb foul odors. Enjoy the drive! Citrus Magic On The Go Just remove the label, set it under a seat or around your vehicle, and forget it for up to 4 weeks Long-Lasting-Freshness No complex chemicals that no one pronounce. Just the power of Citrus, pure and potent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: All citrus magic products are great. The scents are not overwhelming and clean. The solid works good in closets and corners. Beware the sprays will stain because of the citrus oils in it. The sprays also work to remove grease stains from laundry and will remove sticky labels easily. The company use to have a pamphlet with the products stating all the uses for citrus magic. Check it out..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars does not work at all
reviews.reviewText: this does not work at all im disappointed.... my car does not smell like anything and as big as it is it you would think it would work but it doesnt 🤦🏽‍♀️i would not recommend this to anybody to get with how much this is as well it is not worth it to get does not smell or anything

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice scent, but after a couple of days you can't smell it at all. I think it pulls in odors, but it doesn't fill the car with a fresh smell like I was expecting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than other air fresheners/deoderizers
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty good deoderizer/freshener for your car with a clean smell. Definitely more odor absorbing than smelling though.I go to the gym often and try to clean the interior of my car 2x a month because it does eventually start smelling like a gym locker. Sometimes life gets in the way though so having these soak up the odors in between cleanings has been a great convenience.I do use 2 at a time for my sedan, 1 underneath each seat. I swap/stagger one of them out every 2-3 weeks and then just chuck that used one in my laundry basket.For under 10 bucks a month it's worth it for me. Don't have to come back to a smelly car/laundry basket

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Odor Absorber ONLY - not for releasing scent.
reviews.reviewText: This product works well for absorbing odors but does not really release much scent in return. Did not work well in car (to obtain scent in car) but works well in son's bedroom for musty odors between laundry days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have a co-worker whose car smells like a 2 year old sweaty gym bag. I bought this and stuck it in his car without him knowing. The smell is still there but it’s at least tolerable now. But this thing has been put to the ultimate test and I would rate it 4/5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Waste of money
reviews.reviewText: Does not do what it claims. Very disappointed. The original smell of product was great. I placed it in my car to help with my pet odor ( my dog goes everywhere with me) and it did not release one ounce of scent 🤷🏻‍♀️🤷🏻‍♀️🤷🏻‍♀️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We have a cat who refuses to use her litter box and has chosen the midway landing of the stairs to do her business. We keep piles of puppy pads there and remove them quickly when used but inevitably some smell lingers. I'd given up hope of fixing that, as cat urine scent is very strong, but these have fixed that. They are long lasting and the scent is very pleasant. I highly recommend these and am so grateful for them.
